goal.en: The main purpose of this course is training students with the basic design of integrated circuits.
goal.ch: 訓練學生具備積體電路設計之基礎。

content.en:
"This course will train students to have large signal analysis (bias), small-signal equivalent circuit, frequency response and feedback circuit of various amplifiers such as single stage, cascode, differential amplifiers based on VLSI concepts and skills. Meawhile, the concepts of frequency response (chapter 8) and feedback (chapter 9) are the essential training for the analog circuit design and control engineering.
The outline of this course is listed as below,
Ch7. Building blocks of integrated circuit amplifiers
Ch8. Differential and multi-stage amplifiers
Ch9. Frequency response
Ch10. Feedback"
content.ch:
課程概述：訓練學生具備分析電晶體大信號(偏壓)、小信號等效電路、頻率響應與回授電路等積體電路設計基本觀念與技巧。第八章之頻率響應與第九章之回授電路為類比電路設計與控制工程必備之基本訓練。
課程目標：訓練學生具備積體電路設計之基礎。
第七章 積體電路放大器之基本電路
第八章 差動放大器與多級放大器
第九章 頻率響應
第十章 回授電路

textbook.en: "Adel S. Sedra and Kenneth C. Smith ""Microelectric Circuits"" 6th ed."
textbook.ch: "Adel S. Sedra and Kenneth C. Smith ""Microelectric Circuits"" 6th ed."

grading.en:
1. Operational Amplifiers (10 %)
2. Single-stage integrated-circuit amplifiers (30%)
3. Differential and multi-stage amplifiers (30%)
4. Feedback (30%)
grading.ch:
1. Operational Amplifiers (10 %)
2. Single-stage integrated-circuit amplifiers (30%)
3. Differential and multi-stage amplifiers (30%)
4. Feedback (30%)
